mapper.select: SELECT u.user_idx, u.user_id, u.user_pw, u.user_profile, u.user_reg_date, u.user_name, u.user_nickname, u.user_email, u.user_phone, u.user_level_idx, u.user_birth_date, u.user_gender, u.user_out_date, u.user_out_reason, u.user_last_login, ul.user_level_desc FROM user_db.user_info_tbl u LEFT JOIN user_db.user_level_tbl ul ON u.user_level_idx = ul.user_level_idx WHERE u.user_idx = #{user_idx}
SELECT u.*, ul.user_level_desc FROM user_db.user_info_tbl u LEFT JOIN user_db.user_level_tbl ul ON u.user_level_idx = ul.user_level_idx WHERE u.user_level_idx = 1 ORDER BY u.user_idx DESC
SELECT u.*, ul.user_level_desc FROM user_db.user_info_tbl u LEFT JOIN user_db.user_level_tbl ul ON u.user_level_idx = ul.user_level_idx WHERE u.user_level_idx != 1 ORDER BY u.user_idx DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE user_db.user_info_tbl SET user_id = #{user_id}, user_pw = #{user_pw}, user_profile = #{user_profile}, user_name = #{user_name}, user_nickname = #{user_nickname}, user_email = #{user_email}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, user_level_idx = #{user_level_idx}, user_gender = #{user_gender}, user_out_reason = #{user_out_reason}, user_last_login = #{user_last_login} WHERE user_idx = #{user_idx}
